name: 陳偉凱
objective:
本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟, 透過課程專題製作,
學者將學習以UML記載分析與設計之結果, 並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之. 課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析, 使用個案, 觀念模型, 有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案, 合作圖, 類別圖,  設計模板,  3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題
schedule:
1. This course covers object-oriented modeling for developing software. Materials covered include class models, state models, and interaction models in UML, a reference process model based on Unified process, implementation issues, and software engineering principles. This course is thinking and programming-intensive. Students are required to complete a non-trivial software project in two iterations. Only object-oriented languages such as C++/Java/C# are allowed.
2. There will be no exams; instead, there are 7 homework assignments and two project reviews. All assignments turned in must be typed (no handwriting will be accepted).
